---
title: "Martha"
---
**The Responsible Doer**

**Strengths:** Dependable, practical, candid

**Role in God’s Story:** Martha serves others with care and speaks honestly with Jesus. Her faith opens the door to one of the boldest declarations of belief in the Gospels.

**Where she shows up in the Gospels:**

* [Luke 10:38–42](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Luke+10%3A38-42&version=NIV) – Welcomes Jesus and worries over many things
* [John 11:17–27](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+11%3A17-27&version=NIV) – Confesses her belief in Jesus as Messiah
